item.description:
The Contemporary Theater Company's performance of Red Herring was one of the funniest plays I've seen in years.  They are a young but very energetic troupe and put on a quality performance.  This Meetup will take in their production of "Eurydice", being performed at the South Kingstown High School.  (This is not a high school play, but that's the venue for this performance.) 

Seating is general admission and is an absolute steal at $22. Here is the description of the play:

Sarah Ruhl presents the timeless myth of Orpheus as told by its heroine. Dying too young on her wedding day, Eurydice journeys to the underworld, where she meets her father and seeks to remember her lost love. With contemporary characters and inventive plot twists, the play offers a fresh twist on an enduring favorite.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $22. Seating is General Admission.

Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please contact the theater. Their box office information is here: http://www.thecontemporarytheater.com/theater/eurydice.htm.

Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Meet-up Logistics

I will provide my cell number when you RSVP.  Meet at the High School by 6:30.  Note that, since the seating is general admission, we will enter the theater as soon as the doors open.  If you are running late, please contact me so we can hold a seat for you.

Directions (per the CTC website)

South Kingstown High School is located at 215 Columbia St. in Wakefield, Rhode Island. The building is handicapped accessible.

Directions from Providence and points north

  1. Take I-95 South to Route 4 South
  2. Take exit for downtown Wakefield
  3. Turn right at end of ramp onto Old Tower Hill Road
  4. Continue straight for one-half mile
  5. Old Tower Hill Road becomes Main Street, continue straight another one-half mile
  6. Turn right at traffic light onto Columbia Street (a gas station will be on your left)
  7. Continue straight one-half mile (stay to the left)
  8. South Kingstown High School will be on your right. Turn right into driveway just pass the building and continue around back to auditorium.

Directions from Newport and points east

  1. Take Route 138 West
  2. Exit onto Route 138/Route 1 South toward Westerly/New York
  3. Continue south for about 7 miles
  4. Take exit for downtown Wakefield
  5. Turn right at end of ramp onto Old Tower Hill Road
  6. Continue straight for one-half mile
  7. Old Tower Hill Road becomes Main Street, continue straight another one-half mile
  8. Turn right at traffic light onto Columbia Street (a gas station will be on your left)
  9. Continue straight one-half mile (stay to the left)
  10. South Kingstown High School will be on your right. Turn right into driveway just pass the building and continue around back to auditorium.

Directions from Westerly and points south

  1. Take Route 1 North
  2. Take Salt Pond Road exit
  3. Turn left at bottom of ramp
  4. Continue straight for 0.3 miles to end of road
  5. Turn left onto Woodruff Avenue
  6. Continue straight for one-half mile, Woodruff Avenue becomes Columbia Street
  7. Continue straight one-half mile (stay to the left)
  8. South Kingstown High School will be on your right. Turn right into driveway just pass the building and continue around back to auditorium.
item.how_to_find_us: At the entrance to the theater
item.name: Eurydice
